targets.query: SELECT 8 * non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "interface_rx" WHERE ("type" =~ /if_(octets)/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance", "type"

SELECT 8 * non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "interface_tx" WHERE ("type" =~ /if_(octets)/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance", "type"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu_value" WITH KEY=host
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu_value" WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface_rx" WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface_rx" WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "iwinfo_value" WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "iwinfo_value" WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ping_value" WITH KEY=type_instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$host/
